name: Minimalist thumbnail for Figma
description:
Hello friends!


I created this template for me and I wanted to share with the community, hope it helps you and your team.


I wanted to keep it simple so the cover doesn’t have many elements, feel free to tweak to your needs.


If you are very busy you don’t need much more, just change the file name, the logo and the client or project name, and that’s it!


☝️ The component has two variants: light and dark. I use the light vs dark variants to separate files that I’m working with my team and files I shared with other stakeholders.


🌈 If you are in a team, you can publish this component as a library and reuse it in every file.


📐 I crafted this covers including a safe zone area to ensure all thumbnails always display optimally.
